assignments.description: Resets all the values of the dummy record.

assignments.description: Sets all the values for an internal attendee.

assignments.description: Rich text needs to be set in a variable before it can be updated in a record.
assignments.name: assRichTextInput

assignments.description: Sets up a dummy record to leverage the lookup filter within the Attendee object.

assignments.label: assSetUpDummy

decisions.description: Checks if another attendee needs to be added.
decisions.name: dcsAddExtraAttendee
decisions.label: dcsAddExtraAttendee

decisions.description: Checks if the internal record type was found.

decisions.description: Check if the contact is internal of external
decisions.name: dcsInternalOrExternal

decisions.description: Checks if the meeting report is correctly created.
decisions.name: dcsMeetingReportFound
decisions.label: dcsMeetingReportFound

decisions.description: Checks if the account or meeting report needs to be opened.

decisions.description: Check if the Record Type Id is found.
decisions.name: dcsRecordTypeIdFound
decisions.label: dcsRecordTypeIdFound

decisions.description: Check if the user wants to save the report.
decisions.name: dcsSaveReport

formulas.description: Extracts this user language code from the current user.

recordCreates.description: Creates all the attendees that were added in the record collection.
recordCreates.name: rcCreateInternalAttendees
recordCreates.label: rcCreateInternalAttendees

recordCreates.label: rcNewMeetingReport

recordLookups.label: getInternalAttendeeRecordType

recordLookups.label: getNewMeetingReport

recordLookups.description: Gets the record type id of the type Meeting Report

fields.name: dtAddAnotherAttendee
fields.fieldText: Would you like to add another attendee to the meeting report?

fields.name: dtAddInternalAttendees
fields.fieldText: Would you like to add a Heijmans contact or a company contact?

fields.name: dtErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
ï»¿Oops, something just went wrong. Please review the error message:


Error: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

Error Time: {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}


In the mean time we've already created a bug record. So your administrator has been noticed as well.

screens.description: Shows that the operation was successful.
screens.name: scrSuccesScreen
screens.label: scrSuccesScreen
